content:
Ava did awesome in her bouldering comp at Boulder Co today. Managed to get 3rd of novice senior girls. Very proud and well deserved. She crushed it sending pretty much every 4 in the gym. 

New room layout is working well. Ava in the small room. JJ next door with the big bed. Chloe has the ranch slider room and a loft bed. Kate and I are upstairs. I like this layout 😁
